alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 1:46PM CST until December 25 at 12:26PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River at Greenville. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur along the river reach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Sunday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 14.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
